text: Manana Archvadze-Gamsakhurdia is a Georgian pediatrician, activist and politician. She served as the inaugural First Lady of independent Georgia from 1991 to 1992 as the wife of President Zviad Gamsakhurdia. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Date of birth unknown Category:Year of birth unknown Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Georgia (country) Category:Pediatricians from Georgia (country) Category:Physicians from Georgia (country) Category:Activists from Georgia (country) Category:Women from Georgia (country) in politics
title: Manana Archvadze-Gamsakhurdia
